svg_images.designer_notes: Create a minimal, clean SVG favicon for Sentimark financial technology company. Simple 'S' letterform with a subtle chart line or upward trend integrated into the design. Primary blue color (#2E5BFF). Professional, modern style with good visibility at small sizes.

Create a professional vector logo for Sentimark financial technology company. Clean, modern wordmark with integrated sentiment graph element. Primary blue color (#2E5BFF). Horizontal format with good visibility at various sizes.

Create a professional white vector logo for Sentimark financial technology company. Clean, modern wordmark with integrated sentiment graph element. Pure white color on transparent background. Horizontal format with good visibility for use on dark backgrounds.

svg_design_notes: All SVGs should be optimized for web use with minimal paths
SVGs should be responsive and scalable to any size
Use clean, modern design principles with minimal details
Ensure SVGs have appropriate viewBox settings
Design should work in both light and dark backgrounds
Use correct color values as specified in the color palette
SVGs should be accessible with proper ARIA attributes when implemented
